title: Top 10 Hardest TV Scenes to Shoot

media:group.media:title: Top 10 Hardest TV Scenes to Shoot
media:group.media:description:
Our hats go off to the crews and actors behind these TV scenes, which were reportedly incredibly difficult to film. For this list, we’ll be looking at the most grueling shoots that TV sets ever saw. Our countdown includes the One Take episode from “The Bear” (2022-), the Hallway Fight from “Daredevil” (2015-18), the Spinning Hallway from “Euphoria” (2019-), Saul’s Kidnapping from “Breaking Bad” (2008-13), and more! If we missed any of your favorite behind the scenes stories, let us know in the comments below. 

Watch more videos on scenes that were difficult to film here:
Top 10 Most Difficult Movie Scenes Ever Filmed: https://youtu.be/BVujVN9me04
Top 10 Most Difficult Documentaries Ever Filmed: https://youtu.be/1E9DkvBw1zI
Top 10 Most Difficult Horror Movie Scenes Ever Filmed: https://youtu.be/f95lrRpvm0M
